translation.O seu acesso à nova economia digital: Your access to the new digital economy
translation.Invista em ativos financeiros de alta pe: Invest in high-performance financial assets, through blockchain technology
translation.A CoinLivre chegou para revolucionar o a: CoinLivre intends to revolutionize the access to multi-investment categories on high performance assets. From beginner to expert, investors will all have access to the benefits the Digital Economy unlocks. Through real assets Tokenization, we connect opportunities from the traditional Brazilian financial market to WEB3’s new age opportunities, making them more competitive and accessible – due to both the reduction of middlemen and the advanced technology the Blockchain has to offer.
translation.Fique por dentro de todas as novidades e: Get ahead by staying in tune with our news and releases
translation.Transformamos ativos reais em ativos dig: We transform real live assets into digital assets, through Blockchain technology. We bond investors to asset owners. We are the bridge, the marketplace that enables the distribution of digitally fractioned assets, which are called Tokens.
translation.Através de uma estruturação jurídica, de: After legal structuring, we define the rules upon which all tokens are published. Once that information is transferred, the SmartContracts are created – which are digital mirrors of physical contracts. That way, we form a digital and legal bond between the real-life asset and its Token, all automatically and without human interference. After it is on the Blockchain, it becomes immutable, pro-audit and public. Finally, it is listed and distributed exclusively through our 24/7 marketplace, globally, and P2P-friendly (peer-to-peer) via our Wallet.
translation.Somos a conexão para a nova economia, pa: We are the connection to the new economy. To the asset-owner, our process enables investment gathering in a much faster and cheaper way – compared to the traditional Banking system -, with higher liquidity which, on itself, brings new business opportunities. Not to mention the ability of getting access to new ways of project funding with huge potential of expansion. To the investors, on the other end, we provide and market new investment options, so they can diversify their portfolio on high performance assets with high tech and legal safety. Needless to say, those options were restricted only to professional qualified investors before we arrived.
translation.Acompanhe nossos lançamentos: Keep up with our Token launches
translation.A CoinLivre viabiliza, através da sua pl: CoinLivre enables, through our digital asset marketplace platform, free access to a whole set os investment categories – all with excellent financial gains, security and transparency.
translation.Fique por dentro de todas as novidades e: Get ahead by staying in tune with our news and releases
